## FloatMatrix.set() method

Returns a new matrix equal to the old one, except with the entry at `(i, j)` replaced with `value`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(i: number, j: number, value: number): Matrix<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  i | <code>number</code> |  |
|  j | <code>number</code> |  |
|  value | <code>number</code> | The new value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<number>`

The new matrix
